name: Saving From Monster
description:
Saving from Monster is an endless run game where there is a monster chasing a human. Humans have to run and avoid the obstacles in front of them. If a human hits an obstacle, his life will be reduced by one.  

Humans can also increase their lives by taking a red poison that will appear randomly in the game.  

I really hope you guys will have fun with this game!  

Controls:

Space - Jump
